articles.title: AGOA: New lease of life for US-Africa trade accord
articles.description: AGOA which has been renewed until the end of 2026, has provided duty-free access to the US for certain African products since 2000.
articles.content:
U.S. President Donald Trump (C) attends a bill signing in the Oval Office of the White House on February 03, 2026 in Washington, DC. [AFP]

articles.title: COG, clinical officers seal CBA after eight-year standoff
articles.description: After eight years of strikes and talks, the Council of Governors and the clinical officers’ union have signed a CBA, ending a major health sector dispute.
articles.content: L–R: George Gibore, KUCO General Secretary and CEO; Dr Dennis Miskellah, KMPDU deputy secretary general; Dr Devji Atellah, KMPDU secretary general and CEO; and Peter Wachira, KUCO chairman. [Wilberfo… [+5815 chars]
articles.author: Maryann Muganda

articles.title: Oscar Sudi: Inside Kapseret MP’s Lucrative OS Dairies Farm That Impressed Wa Muthende
articles.source: Breaking NEWS in KENYA for Today Right Now & Kenyan News | TUKO
articles.description: Mbeere North MP Leo Wa Muthende praises Oscar Sudi's OS Dairies, a model of sustainable dairy farming driving job creation and food security in Kenya.
articles.content:
